name: Wonderflower
description:
The last flower has just wilted, and now the city is devoid of plant life! But you still have one seed left... Meet new people around town and help them in order to gather the materials to plant the wonderflower! Controls CURSOR KEYSMovement / Climbing (once obtained gloves)DOWNInteract / TalkZJump / SelectXSkip text / BackENTER / EOpen/Close Inventory & Map
ESCAPE / PPause Game (Alternate controls for WASD, Space and Shift are included)

Check out the soundtrack!
